snippet.title: Splinter Cell with Gameboy Advance Connectivity Showcase
snippet.description:
No GBA game required, the console downloads the data onto your GBA and lets it serve as a mini map through out most of the game revealing nearby enemies, civilians and security cameras. 

To achieve this you will need:
-Nintendo GameCube OR Nintendo Wii
-Gameboy Advance
-GameCube to Gameboy advance Link Cable
-Splinter Cell (GameCube)
